title: League has too much spoonfeeding.

embed.description: Decided to make a commentary for you guys asking about Kayle Mid/Top/Jungle and a small channel update ☘ Liked the video? Subscribe: http://bit.ly/HkYNOT Follow me on: ➡Twitter: https://twitter.com/Shakarez ➡Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/Shakarez ➡Ask.fm: http://ask.fm/Shakarez Songs used:

body:
I mean, come on.
Look at this, this is DIAMOND bracket, yet he plays as if he was in silver.
He get's out of position due to his retardation, jarvan outplays him, and what happens?
That's right, just flash the fuck away because even if you were harassed so much in lane and were pushed so hard, and then you make a comeback play, league spoonfeeds and requires like no skill to just invul when you make a mistake, and flash and heal away to freedom.

And also, this isn't just some random ranting.
This is DIAMOND bracket, yet these people play like noobs for some reason.
Kayle was out of position 90% of the time at top, where is the damn enemy jungler?  Easy kills at top if their jungler was actually aware.
Overall?
Diamond players play like silver.
